participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and artistic, often reflective and sensitive to the emotions of others.
participant_1.background: I have a hard time feeling connected with people. I grew up homeschooled. I care deeply about animals. I take my emotions out through art. I sometimes need to scream to feel alive.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Idealistic and passionate, often wears his heart on his sleeve, but struggles with self-doubt.
participant_2.background: I dropped out of college a month ago. I live in my foreign car outside los angeles. Some call me a hopeless romantic. I wear my heart on my sleeve.

content.text: I'm not sure if I'm the best person to talk to about this, but I'll try my best.
Thanks, I appreciate it. I'm just not sure what I'm going to do with my life now.
Well, what did you want to do with your life before you dropped out?
I wanted to be a doctor, but I'm not sure if I'm cut out for it anymore.
I'm sure you are. You seem like a smart and capable person.
Thanks, but I don't know. I'm just not sure what I want to do.
Well, what are you interested in?
I'm interested in a lot of things. I like to read, I like to write, and I like to play music.
Well, maybe you could find a job that combines those interests.
That's a good idea. I'll start looking into that.
I'm sure you'll find something you love.
And don't forget, you can always talk to me if you need anything.
